thread.section_title: Autoclick Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Autoclick Rent a Car | autoclickrentacar.com
thread.title: Juliet Chandler
thread.title_full: Autoclick Rent a Car evaluado por Juliet Chandler

author: Juliet Chandler
title: Juliet Chandler
text:
Thankyou Rene and Isobel.
We were delighted with the Ford Focus Estate car, and would like to thank you both for the free upgrade and for a great personal service. We were ,met at Malaga airport as promised (turn right out of the exit, walk under the walkway to the minibus stop) by isobel, and driven just a short distance to the office. Isobel and Rene helped us to amend our booking, by adding an additional driver, and we had an excellent car for 2 weeks in Spain. Very clean, comfortable and with just 9000 km on the clock. On return, Rene received us back in the office, spent just a couple of minutes checking teh car, before releasing our deposit in full, and then driving us straight back to the airport by minibus. Fabulous service Fully recommend :) Juliet and Steve x
